CustomField.description: "Ageing here is calculated on calendar days from Open cases - Today() - created date Closed case - resolved date - created date"
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Open"), TODAY() - DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ClosedDate)), DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 0 ), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Ageing (Number Of Days)
